1142111.content:
A couple of weeks passed and you decided to phone Vienna your best friend. You had a falling out with her, and frankly you were too busy discovering all of the orbs powers so you had lost touch. But after a couple of weeks, tempers cooled and you decided to phone her and invite her over. She came right away and when you saw each other you fell into each other's arms professing your regrets at what had happened. You were friends again.

"Well, I invited you here to show you something. I just have to tell someone and you are my best friend," you told her.

"What???" she said.

"I'll have to show you, you won't believe it unless I do." You led Vienna upstairs and showed her Willy's room. Everything in there had changed. Willy himself was sitting on his bed, wearing a cute blue and red jumper over a blue top and white tights. He wasn't wearing any shoes and was playing with some stuffed animals. Sitting in the corner reading a book, was Stacy (the most popular girl at school.) The room itself was totally different than how it was two weeks ago. The colors of the room were blue, but they were a light pastel blue, instead of the deep blue they had been before. Stuffed animals were everywhere. They were on the bed, on the desk, on the floor, and still more in the closets. In the closet Vienna could see tops and pants mostly, but they were in every color of the rainbow especially pastels. There were also clearly some dresses and Vienna was sure she could see a skirt or two too. On top of the drawers were some games, monopoly, sorry, girl talk, the barbie board game, some others. On the walls were posters Vienna could recognize having characters from shows on Nickelodeon and the Disney Channel. It was now clearly a young girl's room.


You motioned Vienna to join you in your room.

"What happened? Did your brother become a gaywade all of a sudden"

You explained about finding the orb and all that it could do and then you told her, "I used it on Willy. He now thinks and acts like a ten-year old girl."

Laughing Vienna said," You made him think he is a little girl?"

"No, not exactly. He still thinks he is a man. He just acts and has the maturity of a young girl. If you ask him about himself, he'll say the usual things but if you ask him about what he likes, you'll get the answers of a young girl. He did have to drop out of college though?"

"He did?"

"Yes, he is still as smart as he ever was, but you can't have a ten-year old doing the responsible thing and going from class to class like an adult would. But he is much happier now playing with his toys and games. He has named all his dolls and he loves to play 'Sorry'. That's his favorite game."

"But I saw Stacy in the room with him. Is she also ten?"

"Heaven's no. She is his babysitter. He isn't mature enough to be home alone without someone watching him. At first I would watch him all the time. I used to love watching him play with his Barbies for hours. Or we would play 'Sorry' together. But I had other things to do (like using my powers) and so we had to find a babysitter. I went over to Stacy's house and now she loves to babysit for him. She treats him like the little girl he acts like." you explained.

"But she was such a bitch to us at school. Did you change her?"

"Well at school I guess. But while working she is totally professional. I didn't have to change her besides making her accept the job. But if I hear she isn't a good babysitter for Willy then I'll fix her. I thought about it a lot. Willy acts like a ten-year old. Stacy will act like a toddler. Not only that, she'll act like one of those toddlers who doesn't like wearing clothing. She'll be running around naked without a care in the world. But as long as she is professionally I'm not worried about this."

"OK, I guess."

"Oh, that reminds me, Willy's girlfriend came over a few days after he dropped out of school. I decided to let her see him the way he is. When she saw him, she started calling him names, like queer and faggot. Willy said he still loved her, although I don't think he knows what love means anymore. Not like he did anyway. But she wouldn't let up. Willy started crying. I had to tell her to leave. But I really felt sorry for Willy so when she left, I changed her sexual orientation, She is now an avowed lesbian. But she doesn't like just any woman, she is now only attracted to women who are at least five or ten years older than her parents. I don't know if she found an old lady yet, but I'm sure she will."

Vienna never met Willy's girlfriend so she didn't have any sympathy for her.

"What about your sister Maggy?"

There was no hours of looking for the perfect dress. No extra time looking for the right shoes to go with it. And what about the proper jewelry and purse? He went to a barber and had his hair trimmed. You would have to spend months trying out different hair-doos until you found the right one. You have to hire a makeup artist. You had to get your nails done. You would also have to get your legs and armpits waxed. There was so much to do. Willy had it easy. Not this time, you thought.

So you went to outside of Willy's door and put some ideas in his head. "Willy," you said directly to his mind. "You are going to the Richmond High School Prom this year. It is a fact, Laura bought you tickets and found you a date. You can't back out. This is a special day so you will go all out. You must find the perfect dress. It has to be short and poofy to highlight your legs. You will need to have your legs and armpits waxed so you look your best. You need matching shoes and a purse. You have to select the perfect jewelry and hairstyle to bring out your look." Continuing you told him, "He must check several places (dress shops, jewelry stores, hair stylists, makeup and nail artists) to find the right look and don't be shy about asking questions. You want to be the most beautiful of any of the GIRLS at the prom and you will spare no expense of effort."

You thought this was going to be fun, not only would he waste his money on all he needed for prom, but it would be extremely embarrassing for him to You worded the instructions so that he couldn't just do it quickly, but he would have to visit many places. You couldn't wait to see how he did turn out for prom.

Then you added one last thing. Since you are spending so much time and effort, when you have the whole thing complete, the day before prom schedule an appointment at Glamour Shots and get professional; pictures for you to keep forever. Don't forget to smile."

134132121333233311113221111112111.title: Terra meets up with Kevin

1341321213332333111132211111121111.title: Kevin's mother picks Terra and Kevin up

13413212133323331111322111111211111.content:
The cell phone rang. It was Kevin's mother she had finally arrived. From now on, I'll refer to her as Mom.

“Boy am I glad to hear from you. They are crazy over here. You have to get me out of here.”

“No problem, Dear.” Mom didn't ask what exactly was wrong.

“Mom, Terra is here with me,” Kevin broke in. “You have to take us both.”

“I kind of expected that,” she said. She didn't explain how or why she knew and Kevin didn't pick up that. “I'm waiting outside right in front of the building at the side entrance. Come now.”

“I think you should come up here. Did you bring clothes like I asked?”

“Well not exactly. But you should just come to me.”

“I really can't.”

“Do you know where you are in the building?”

“Mom was right,” Kevin thought. “He wasn't sure where he was in the building. It might be best to just make a break for it.” In reality the last thing that Kevin wanted to do was leave this room dressed as he was, but he couldn't defy his mother. No matter how he justified what he did to himself he had to do whatever she told him. Kevin told Terra where his mother was and that they were going to run to her. This seemed to be as good a plan as any to Terra. Terra didn't see a need for Mom to come in and find them.

OK, on three.” Kevin told Terra as they were standing right behind the closed door. "ONE....TWO.....THREE!” and then they ran. Terra was wearing higher heels than Kevin but she was used to them. Kevin had never worn heels in his life. The shoes he was wearing were designed for a small girl so they weren't too bad. Kevin let Terra run first so he could keep an eye on her besides Kevin was having a hard time running in a dress so billowy. The petticoat kept the dress already puffed out. Kevin was dressed like a little girl, but he ran like a man or as close as he could considering what he was wearing and the heels that was on his feet. He might have tried to remove the heels if he could, but the dress made access to his feet pretty difficult. Several people saw the could flee the premises but they didn't do anything to stop them.

When they found Mom's car, they discovered that she had the rear door open for them. She told them to get into the back and they both did without question. Kevin was worried that his mom would ask him about how he was dressed, but she never said a word.
13413212133323331111322111111211111.title: Kevin and Terra escape

134132121333233311113221111112111111.content:
Mom drove straight to her own house. Kevin wanted to go home, but maybe this was best. Mom could park in her garage and they could enter her house without being scene by anyone. To get to Kevin's apartment he would have to walk up the path, walk through the halls and wait in the elevator.

“OK, everyone come in and I'll fix you up,” Mom announced. Terra also wanted to go home, but Kevin gave her a look so she didn't say a word.

Once inside the house, Mom told Kevin to go to the guest bedroom and she would help him get out of his dress. Kevin knew he needed help with the zipper so he didn't say anything.

When Kevin led the way, Terra hung back. She had something to tell Mom. “Mrs.,” Terra started to say but Mom cut her off.

“Honey, just call me Mom.”

“OK Mom. Do you have any tampons,” she asked confidentially.

“No, but I have something else that'll work,” Mom whispered. Then to Kevin, “You go right ahead, I'll be with you in a moment. Terra and I had to take care of something.” Kevin looked back. “Woman's problems,” Mom continued.

Mom led Terra into the bathroom. “I don't have tampons, but I do had a diaper which will do even better.”

“A diaper? I'm not wearing a diaper!” said indigently.

“Hey you have worn pads haven't you? Think of it as an extra long, extra thick pad. It's really the same thing.”

Terra couldn't really argue with that. When you came right down to it a diaper was pretty much made out of the same thing as a pad: from the absorbent top layer to the plastic outer layer.

“I guess you are right. Give it to me and I'll put it on.”

“No, I had better put it on for you. Putting on a diaper is a bit tricky to put on by yourself.” Terra didn't really want to, but she felt she had no choice. Terra took off all she was wearing (the lace teddy) and then she sat on the toilet. Meanwhile, Mom got some cream and some baby powder. She put the cream into the diaper and then liberally spread the powder all around it.

“Hey, what's that for,”

“This is a diaper not a pad, it needs powder and other stuff to make it more comfortable.” Terra thought the cream was some sort of baby lotion, but in fact it was depilatory. Mom fastened Terra into her diaper and then asked, “There doesn't that feel better?” Terra had to agree it did. Then from out of nowhere Mom produced a nightgown. It was a Little Mermaid themed nightgown with princess Ariel on the top and a seascape underneath. Mom left while Terra put it on.

A few moments later Terra left the bathroom but found the door to the guest bedroom closed. Terra assumed that Kevin was changing so she waited.

Back in the guest bedroom Kevin waited for his mother to help him out. He removed his headpiece and his gloves, but that was all he could do. He couldn't unzip the back zipper of the dress. The dress's circumference was so wide that he couldn't even take off his shoes. He couldn't believe what he was wearing. Not only was he wearing a dress, but he was wearing what looked sort of like a crown with a veil. He couldn't remember the last time he saw even a woman in a veil. Well maybe for a wedding but that was it.

When his mother got into the room (and closed the door behind her) she said with a slightly raised voice, “What are you doing?”

“I'm just waiting for you.”

“You can't just throw you things willie-nillie. They have to be taken care of properly.” Mom was referring to the discarded headpiece and gloves. Kevin thought she was sort of right, even though he really didn't care what happened to them.

“I'm sorry for shouting,” she said in a more pleasant tone. ”Now turn around and I'll get you out of that.”

Kevin did as she requested and she quickly pulled down the zipper. That was all the help that Kevin thought he needed. Mom insisted that she finish. “If I don't know you just throw your things around. I won't have that in this house. Kevin didn't want to upset his mother anymore so he let her finish undressing him. She told him to lift his arms and then she pulled his dress over his head, leaving him naked from the waist up. He still wore his petticoat. Mom folded the dress properly. Kevin was about to step out of the petticoat when mom said, “Don't you dare!” When she was done with the dress, she helped him out of the petticoat leaving him in his clearly wet diaper an his shoes and socks. This was the first time that Kevin could see his diaper and his pretty heels.

Kevin stepped out of his shoes when his mom told him and then she took off his socks leaving him only in a wet diaper.

Mom unfastened the tabs of the diaper and when it was loosened a stream of pee escaped Kevin's penis. The diaper protected Mom from being hit by the stream. “Looks like you need another diaper,” she told him.

“But Mom, it wasn't my fault.”

“I won't hear any excuses.”

Kevin didn't want to stir the pot. Besides what was he supposed to wear, his mom's panties? Mom seemed to have all the supplies she needed to clean him up and get him into a new diaper. Kevin didn't consider why she had such things. She used wipes to clean Kevin's privates and then as with Terra she put depilatory and powder into the diaper. Kevin didn't question her about any of it. She made him lie flat on the bed and then she put the diaper on him and securely fastened the tabs. “Now don't take this off,” she told him. A moment later she continued, “You can't go around wearing only a diaper so put this on.” She handed him a nightgown with the same Ariel character as Terra was now wearing. In effect both Terra and Kevin were wearing identical outfits from the diaper to the nightgown.

Terra would have usually started to giggle at the sight of Kevin in his sleepwear. But after what they had been through she just took it in stride. “Well you two have had a tough day. You should get some sleep,” Mom told them.
134132121333233311113221111112111111.title: At Mom's house

1341321213332333111132211111121111111.content:
“There was some sense in what Mom said,” Kevin thought. There wasn't much he could do now. Some sleep would be a good idea. Besides, he wanted to talk to Terra alone.

“I'd read you a bedtime story, but there is so much I have to do,” Mom told them. Both thought she was joking, but she was deadly serious. Mom left the room as Terra and Kevin got into bed. Once the lights when out, exhaustion overtook them both and they fell fast asleep.

In the other room, Mom got online onto the Macys website. She purchased the beginnings of a wardrobe for Kevin and Terra. She started with the dresses. She picked out very formal dresses in styles that little girls wear but that also came in larger sizes. She wanted her children to be like little princesses and princesses always wore pretty dresses. She resolved that they would never wear pants again. What princess ever wore pants? There wasn't much of a selection, but it was a start. The next thing she chose was tights. Mom always preferred tights to socks. She bought several pairs of white tights.

The final thing she could find were shoes. The shoes had to be formal in nature to go with the dresses. Sneakers of any type were unacceptable. So were anything casual. The problem was that shoes that fit little girl's didn't come in 'adult' sizes. She would have to find women's shoes that looked like shoes for little girls. The easiest thing to find were maryjane type shoes. Those always looked juvenile. She also needed some nice flats. Little girls don't wear heels like women did or even formal sandals or open toed shoes. But the ballet flats had to have a formal look to them. Something shiny in white leather to go with the tights seemed perfect.

She also thought that her princesses should wear long white gloves like Cinderella and of course a tiara. But she couldn't find those things at Macys so she would have to get them later.

Mom used the in store pickup feature and then asked one of her friends to pick the stuff up for her. She couldn't leave her little princesses alone for a minute. "They were too young to be left by themselves," she thought. She didn't have a stroller or the proper car seats to take them on her errands. Once done, Mom went to bed.
1341321213332333111132211111121111111.title: Mom makes plans

13413212133323331111322111111211111111.content:

His mother hearing the argument, suggested to Kevin that he quit and without thinking about it too much he did. Kevin didn't like his job anyway. Once he put down the phone, Kevin realized what he had done and was about to call back. But his mother said not to. She would make sure all his expenses were paid until he got a new job. She knew that his working days were over. Princesses don't work, she thought and neither will my little princess.

Breakfast was on the table for Terra and Kevin. It was Cream of Wheat and a big cup of apple juice. Kevin hadn't had this for a long time and it did taste good. It was warm and lots of extra sugar was added to sweeten the taste. Terra was sitting next to him and giving him all sorts of looks. But she didn't speak up until Mom had left the room. “When can we get out of here?”

“I don't know. I need some clothes, I can't go out like this.”

“It's the same as last night. But we can't stay here forever.”

“What do you suggest we do, run into the street dressed in nighties?”
13413212133323331111322111111211111111.title: In the Morning

134132121333233311113221111112111111111.content:
“I think I should call my Dad. He'll come and get us. I don't know what is up with your mom, but she seems to want us to stay here.”

Douglas told 'the woman on the phone that he didn't know who she was and that he didn't have a daughter. Terra was shocked. She started to beg, but he hung up on her. She didn't know what to do. 134132121333233311113221111112111111111.title: Terra's plan

“Terra, I'll bet when you were younger you loved dress up too. I'll bet you loved to dress like a princess. You loved to wear pretty flowing dresses, tiaras and pretty shoes. You liked to accessorize with gloves, bracelets and necklaces.”

“All little kids love to play dress up. Even Kevin did. I caught him trying to put on my dress when he was young.

“Mom,” Kevin complained. He didn't want anyone to know about this. (Even if it never happened.)

Mom continued to reminisce. “Those were great times,” she said wistfully. “You used to call me Mommy back then. I liked that. Both of you call me Mommy again from now on.”

“OK, but just this once, Mommy,” Kevin said purposefully.

Just like with their gait, Kevin and Terra would call her Mommy without realizing anything had changed.

After the home videos, Mom suggested that they watch a regular DVD. She suggested that they watch 'Maleficent' which was more of an adult themed movie than most of the Disney Princess movies. Kevin didn't want to watch it, but Terra did. With little else to do, Kevin agreed and they all viewed the movie. Even Kevin turned out liking it.

During the movie, Terra was about to leave to use the bathroom. She told Mom who told her, since she was already wearing a diaper she should just use that instead and she would change her after the movie was over. There wasn't any reason to miss part of the movie or for them to pause it while she was gone. As with many things that had happened, what Mom said made sense to her. Whether she peed in the bathroom or in the diaper, Mom would have to change her after she was done anyway. Terra told Mom she would try and wait until after the movie was over, but the suggestion weighed upon her. Before the movie was over Terra had peed her diapers for the first time in two decades. 1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: Mom shows them a video

After getting into bed Kevin told her, “Terra, I don't know what is happening, but I think we should just play along until we can figure something out. That way she won't suspect anything. I'll work on a plan to get us out of here.”

It had a special crown feature on top. As the ad described it, the bed was “fitting for a princess, the carriage bed evokes images of happily ever after.“ It was perfect. She ordered it immediately. Now she would have to build a room around the bed.

After she was done, Mom went up to wake up her little princesses from their nap. Kevin was wet of course and she changed them both. Terra didn't know why she was being changed, but Mom insisted that if she changes one, she should just do them both at the same time. It seemed strange to her, but Mom's logic did have some sort of sense to it.

“I think you should see a doctor,” Mom told Kevin.

“Why?”

“Because you can't keep yourself dry. A doctor should look at you.” This was true, Kevin was wetting himself uncontrollably. He didn't even know he was doing it until he felt the warmth in his diaper. Mom was right, he should see a doctor to find out what was wrong.

“What happened?”

“I guess Macys was back logged. The order wasn't ready.”

The picture of the box showed it was clearly for adults. The paints were rich colors like the stills of the 1930s. “Why don't we all try the same picture and we'll see who does the best.” Kevin and Terra decided to play along.

Kevin and Terra started as per Mom's request. But Mom didn't paint. When it was time, she said she had to start on dinner, but that she would be right back. There was always one excuse or another as to why Mom didn't start. Finally, Mom said she was so far behind she would just watch them. Kevin and Terra took special care to paint inside the lines which took a lot of time. Mom checked to see if Kevin was wet in the middle and when he was she insisted that she changed them both.

After dinner, Mom suggested they play a board game. When Kevin found out that the game she meant was “Chutes and Ladders” he complained.

“Come on, Mommy. We can't play that.”

“Bet?”

“Yeah if you win, I'll do whatever you want.” This sounded good to Kevin. It was two against one. If either he or Terra won, they would get Mom to drive them home.

“Anything?”

“Yes, but if I win you two have to do whatever I say.”

“It's a bet.”

The three played the game went back and forth. But when Terra or Kevin was on the verge of victory, they always landed on a chute and fell back. Usually way back. In the end, Mom won. She actually cheated, but shew knew what was bets for her little princesses and this was the only way.

“OK, Mommy,” Kevin said resigned to his fate. “what will it be?”

“I'll tell you tomorrow.” she said trying to seem mysterious.

“How about double or nothing then?”

“Are you sure?”

“YES.”

During the game, Mom got a call. She answered it and then informed Kevin who it was. “Good news,” Mom told them. “The doctor called and said he can see you tomorrow.”

“But we can't go out like this.”

“Oh don't worry, I'll have some clothes for you for tomorrow.”

The result of the first game was the same as the second.

When they were done, it was dinner time. Mom served dinner and it was very good. It was Japanese styled beef with vegetables. The beef as is traditional was already cut up by the time it reached the table. Everything that they ate was all cut up like it would be for a small child. Breakfast was Cream of Wheat, lunch was chicken fingers, although they have been cut up to make them look like small chicken nuggets and dinner was this sliced steak that was already cut into small pieces.

After dinner, Mom suggested they try karaoke. The songs she used were from the Disney Frozen: Karaoke series. After they were done, Mom changed them both again. Kevin was wet again and starting to really get concerned. Mom always insisted on changing them both at the same time. After they were changed, Mom gave them two new nightgowns. They had been wearing the same nightgown all day. But this time, she said, because of the great pictures they painted this afternoon they would be wearing Cinderella nightgowns. Then she told them to go to sleep. Neither felt tired, but they wanted to talk some more. As with the afternoon, nap once in their bed they fell immediately to sleep.
1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: The rest of the afternoon

What didn't appeal to him was that Mom was in the bathroom with them. Mom said she didn't wanted any funny stuff to happen in her house.

When the bath was over, Mom diapered them. Then she said, “OK, you lost the bet and it's time to pay the price. Terra you said you liked dressing up as a princess when you were young. I have this really pretty dress, put it on now. Mom had lied when she said that their clothing hadn't arrived. Neither of them knew what type of clothing she had selected.

“I don't want to,” she said.

“You lost the bet, so you have to.”

“Awe come one Terra, I'm sure you will look so pretty in that,” Kevin joked.

“Funny you should say that, I have a dress for you too.”

“What???” Kevin exclaimed.

“You both lost so you have to do the same thing. It seems only fair.” Kevin was trapped by his own words.

Mom brought out two dresses. They were white sleeveless flower girl dresses with a rounded neck. The bodice was sequenced and had an flat decorative braid. The skirt was flared although not as poofy as the one that Kevin had worn. It also had a sash that tied in the back along with a back zipper. The dresses that Kevin and Terra wore were in size 14 and 10 respectively. Very few older girls wore a dress like this. They were made for a much younger girl. At Macys you could buy this dress in sizes as low as 2T.

Soon, Kevin and Terra were wearing the pretty flower girl dress (not as fancy as what Kevin was wearing two nights ago). “Haha,” Kevin said, “very funny, Mommy.”

“You aren't done yet.” She then put white tights on the pair and white maryjane shoes. “OK, let me change,” Kevin said.

“Why not?”

Once in them, they found they couldn't buckle themselves in. Mom had to do it for them. Once in their seats they couldn't unbuckle them either. Mom drove to the doctor's office. 1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: The next morning

1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.content:
They drove to his office and inside his parking garage. They both felt thankful that no one was there and they could get into the elevator. They were thankful again when they didn't see anyone in the elevator, halls or waiting room. Mom and Terra waited in the waiting room while Kevin went to be examined.

Kevin somehow dozed off while waiting for the doctor. The doctor gave Kevin a first round of electrolysis. He also examined Kevin's genitals and the rest of his body. While waiting, Terra also fell asleep. Unbeknownst to Terra, she was also examined by the doctor. She was returned to the waiting room before awakening.

When Kevin came to consciousness the doctor started to talk to him. “It's much more serious than I had thought,” the doctor warned. “It can be controlled with medication, but you can never be alone. You might have a seizure. If you are alone and have a seizure you could die. Can you stay with anyone?”

“Well I sort have been staying with Mommy.”

“That is good. You mustn't be left alone, not even for a few minutes.” Kevin was scared at the doctor's warning.

“I understand. Will my wetting stop?”

“The wetting is just a symptom. That and your blackouts and how you can just pass out instantly. You did it while you were here. We were talking and you just passed out. Don't you remember?”

OK, I just want to run one last test and then you can take him home.”

I also want you to stay in diapers even after your period ends to make everything seem perfectly normal. That he isn't the only one in a diaper. Also when he goes to sleep, you'll go too. You will always be together, he can't be alone for an instant.”

“OK, what ever you say Mommy.”

Back in the examining room, the Doctor made the motions of giving Kevin another test. When he was done the doctor told Kevin, “I want you back here in three days for additional tests.” Not coincidentally, in three days Mom had arranged for the guest bedroom to be painted. She had selected the color. It was a color called “Cotton White” “Cotton White” is a rich ivory color with just a hint of pink which would look great in any girl's bedroom.

“Before you go, one last thing.”

“Yes Doctor”

“How come you are wearing a dress?”

“It's my Mommy's joke. I lost a bet she made me come like this.”

“It's just like your mother to do something like that. But it's good she did. It's important you don't wear anything tight like pants. You should always wear a skirt. If it's too cold then wear it with tights.”

“You have to be pulling my leg.”

He also explained that Kevin should never wear pants until the medicine had some time to work. He shouldn't go to work either and he reiterated that Kevin should always be monitored.

It was an oval mirror like the one seen by the witch in Snow White. It had a beveled edge and was beautifully framed in antiqued white with intricate rose detailing. 1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: At the doctor's office

1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.content:

1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: A new routine is formed

1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.content:

Mom explained that she was worried that he would pass out and hurt himself, even if Terra was in there with him. Mom would select a different nice dress for her princesses to wear everyday. There would also always be tights and pretty shoes to go along with the dress. Then they would all watch a video. Mom loved Disney animated movies and every day they would watch a different one. When the movie was over it would be time for lunch followed by an hour nap. Coloring with crayons would follow and then a board game. They played Chutes & Ladders, Candyland, Mousetrap, Operation and other games. None of the games ever involved reading or counting over six. Without making any bets, Terra and Kevin started to win most of these games. Mom told Kevin to start dressing and undressing Barbies to give his finger more exercise. 1341321213332333111132211111121111111111.title: A new routine continued

The room quickly filled up with dolls, stuffed animals and other toys. All of the toys were recommended for children five and under.

Terra (who hadn't been called Terra in months) insisted that she stay with him. She hadn't left his side since this all began. They were both scared of being separated and away from home. 13413212133323331111322111111211221111.title: Douglas sees Terence's new look

Jennifer was really married to her career. She was determined to reach the top, even if it meant she had to sacrifice having a family. She had no intention of marrying or having children. When she had a “itch to scratch”, she might have the odd fling with some likely lad, but that was all. This was much to her mother’s dismay. Bridget, her mom, was very eager to fix her daughter up with a husband, so she could start producing grandchildren. She even had a candidate in mind, the son of a close friend.

You suddenly realized that you knew Jennifer’s mother – she was a friend of your own mother! By this time, you were both sitting in Jennifer’s car, Jennifer waiting for you to tell her where to take you.

“What’s he like?”, you asked.

“Brian?”, replied Jennifer. “Oh, he’s a nice guy. Handsome, good-hearted, eager to please. For the right girl, he’d be a ‘good catch’. But he wants an old-fashioned housewife – someone to pump out lots of kids for him, and then stay home taking care of them while he goes out and brings home the bacon. That’s just not for me.”

You thought about this for a moment. An idea came into your head.

“I’d like to meet him”, you said. “If you called him now, do you think you could get him to meet you for dinner tonight?”

“Are you kidding? He’d drop everything and come running!”

“Alright, then. Call him, and tell him you want to meet him for dinner tonight. Tell him you’ll have a friend with you. You’ll explain when you get there.”

Jennifer called Brian and quickly made dinner arrangements.

“He’s meeting us at Chez Pierre at 7:00”, she said.

“Good job”, you said. Then you had her drive you home. When she dropped you off, then went home to change. You went into your house, and found your parents sitting in the living room. You told them that you’d be going out for dinner, and that you weren’t sure when you’d be home. They voiced no objections, of course. You quickly showered and changed into your best clothes – Chez Pierre was a pretty fancy French restaurant. On a hunch, you packed a change of clothes and your schoolbooks. You told your parents that you might be out all night. By the time you were ready, Jennifer was outside waiting to pick you up.

The pair of you met Brian at the restaurant. You had Jennifer introduce you as her “second cousin”. You scanned Brian’s mind. Brian Gallagher was a decent enough guy, no deep dark secrets or anything like that. He wasn’t secretly an axe murder, or whatever. He was polite to you, and didn’t show any resentment at not being alone with Jennifer.

The three of you had a pleasant dinner together. Afterwards, you decided to play matchmaker, and to make Bridget Higgins a very happy woman. You turned to Jennifer.

Jennifer, from this moment forward, you love Brian with all your heart, and want nothing more than to marry him as soon as possible and to make a happy home for him for the rest of your life. You will want to be the best wife for him that you possibly can. You will want to have as many of his children as you can, and to spend to rest of your life raising them and being the best mother that you possibly can be, and to be the best grandmother you can be if and when that time comes. You will love, honor, respect and be faithful to him until death do you part. You will set aside all thoughts of a career, and find total fulfillment in being a wife and mother. You will be as close to a perfect housewife as you can be. Making him happy will be your goal in life.

Then you turned to Brian.

Brian, from this moment forward, you love Jennifer with all your heart, and want nothing more than to marry her as soon as possible and to provide everything you can for her for the rest of your life. You will want to be the best husband for her that you possibly can. You will want to give her as many children as you can, and to spend to rest of your life raising them and being the best father that you possibly can be, and to be the best grandfather you can be if and when that time comes. You will love, honor, respect and be faithful to her until death do you part. You will set aside all selfish thoughts, and find total fulfillment in being a husband and father. You will be as close to a perfect husband and provider as you can be. Making her happy will be your goal in life.

Jennifer and Brian looked starry-eyed at one another, holding hands across the table.

As an afterthought, you gave them an additional order: Neither of you mention to anyone that it was me who brought you together. If anyone asks, just say that you got together on your own and realized how much you meant to one another.

After dinner, the three of you went back to Brian’s place. You’d decided that you wanted to see them consummate their relationship.

Both of you will be sexually compatible with one another, you thought, and have as happy, healthy and vigorous a sex life as you can.

You followed them into the bedroom. As Brian undressed, you thought about having a spin with him yourself. You decided that it was only fair to let Jennifer go first. You watched as they did the act – you’d never gone all the way yourself, so you learned a thing or two. You didn’t have them bother with a condom – they’d be getting married soon anyway, so that even if Jennifer got pregnant, it wouldn’t matter that much.

Afterwards, they drifted off to sleep in each other’s arms. You went out and watched Brian’s TV and did some schoolwork, drifting off to sleep yourself after a while. When you woke up, it was nearly midnight. You panicked for a moment, and then remembered that you didn’t really have a curfew anymore. You went in and looked in on the two lovers. Brian really did look pretty studly. You bet he’d be ready for another round by now. You roused the pair of them and sent Jennifer off to watch TV. Of course, she didn’t object. Brian was, indeed, ready to go again. It was like nothing you’d ever done before – even Vienna’s attentions earlier didn’t match up to this. Of course, this time you made him wear a condom. You did not want a child just now! You felt really relaxed afterwards, if a little sore. You’d have to “borrow” Brian once in a while – Jennifer wouldn’t mind. You summoned Jennifer in to bed, and the three of you slept together. When the alarm went off in the morning, you had Jennifer go down on you - just the way to start off the day - and then the three of you took a hot shower together. It was a little crowded, but you didn’t mind. You had a quick breakfast, and then had Jennifer drive you to school. You made her promise to tell you how her mother took the news, and had Brian promise to buy an engagement ring for Jennifer that very day.

When you got to home room, Vienna was there. She smiled at you and you winked at her. You looked around the classroom. Did you want to “play” with someone now, or wait until later?

141311.content:
You looked around the classroom. Who to give the boot to? There were two likely candidates:


1) Billy Samson: A big, musclebound football player. Attractive in the way that a well-groomed gorilla might be said to be attractive. You had no particular beef with him, but you had no especial use for him, either.


2) Jenna Corrigan: A ditzy airhead. Living proof the brunettes could be just as dumb as blondes were said to be. Known for being “user-friendly” to any guy she liked. Not exactly a pal, but she had lent you money one time when you’d been short on cash, and hadn’t been particularly worried when you couldn’t pay her back for a week.


You decided that Billy was the one who had to go. You texted the office, and soon Billy found himself being summoned out of class. Bye-bye, Billy!, you thought.

You looked around. Who else was here? Ah, there was Stacy Van Der Brugge, the Queen of High School Society, and her ladies-in-waiting, Jeannette Lacroix, Clair Namikawa, Melissa Alvarez and Martha Johnson. They considered themselves the upper crust of the school, and wouldn’t even speak to a low-life like yourself. Sitting across from them was Rachel Anderson.

Stacy was forever sniping back and forth with Rachel, the class’ resident left-wing political activist. Rachel was constantly going on about how everything bad in the world was because of our oppressive patriarchal society, and she saw Stacy as its chief representative. Rachel wasn’t evil or anything, but it could become very tiresome how she tied everything back to politics. Her constant bickering with Stacy was occasionally amusing, but it was mostly wearisome. You decided to put an end to it.

You probed Stacy’s mind. She had been dating Todd Habsburg, the quarterback of the school’s football team, but she had dumped him a month ago, when she caught him chasing after a cheerleader. Rachel wasn’t dating anyone, either, you found. None of the boys here was politically “aware” enough for her.

You thought about what to do. Today was Friday – so, you give it about two weeks…You put a thought into their heads:

Starting from now, you two will slowly but steadily become more and more attracted to one another, emotionally and physically, until by two weeks from now, you will be totally and madly in love with each other. Two weeks from tomorrow, you will meet “accidentally” by the big stone next to Loman’s Pond at 3:00 in the afternoon. As soon as you’re alone – and I’ll make sure there’s no one there but me, and you won’t notice me – you’ll declare your undying love for one another and became a couple. You won’t advertise your relationship, but when people figure it out, you won’t deny it, either.

You thought about it and decided to be merciful. If your parents hassle you about this, you let me know, and I’ll make sure they have a nice, “accepting” attitude.

You looked at the two of them. You caught Rachel looking speculatively at Stacy, as though she’d never seen her before. You’d have to make sure to be in the park that day, you wanted to see this.

Now, what to do about Stacy’s four minions. You looked around the room and saw Kellen Davis, the horrifying little nerdboy who had the hots for you. You smiled as an idea occurred to you. You probed the four girls’ minds. None of them had a steady boyfriend – they preferred stringing guys along and then dumping them when they tired of them. You decided to make Kellen’s life “interesting”. He was a big reader of manga, especially “harem comedies”, where some unprepossessing dweeb – much like himself – suddenly had several hot girls fighting over him. Well, he was about to get a taste of that.

You placed a thought into the four girls’ minds:

As of right now, you are all madly in love with Kellen Davis, You all think he is the hottest guy ever. You are willing to do whatever it takes to impress him, and from now on, whatever he likes, you like, even if it means becoming total nerdgirls yourselves. You all want to be his harem, and are just fine with sharing him between you unselfishly. Make sure he knows that all four of you are at his disposal, and that you all want to fulfil his every fantasy. If he picks one of you over the others, you will graciously support her. If he wants more than one of you, or all of you, you will be fine with that, too.

There, that ought to keep him occupied, one way or another, you thought. When class ended, the four of them made a beeline for Kellen, who looked astonished and maybe even a little nervous.

As you left the room, Liz Cullen bumped into you., knocking your books to the floor.

“Watch it, you idiot!”, she said, as though it were your fault. As Vienna hurriedly picked up your books, you glared at Liz, and thought, From now on, whenever you wake up in the morning, you will crow like a rooster, as loud as you can. Liz went out of the room without looking back, unaware of how interesting her mornings were about to become. You smiled a happy smile.

At lunch that day, you sat with Vienna and looked around the cafeteria. Kellen, looking bewildered, found himself surrounded by Jeannette, Clair, Melissa and Martha, who were fawning over him and feeding him by hand. Probably they would have chewed his food for him if he would have let them.

Stacy and Rachel sat alone at two separate tables, each sneaking occasional glances at each other, like they wanted to speak to one another but were afraid to.

Billy sat with his jock buddies, obviously complaining about the arbitrary change in his schedule.

All in all, it had been a productive morning.

You’d had an entertaining couple of weeks. You’d enjoyed watching your schoolmates’ reaction to Kellen’s new harem. Kellen’s reaction had been interesting, too. He’d gone from shock – and maybe a little fear – to joy at his new status. He was dressing better, too – doubtless his girls’ influence.

Liz Cullen had started looking haggard when she showed up for school in the morning. You looked into her mind, and saw that she was starting to wonder if she was going crazy, or had been cursed. Apparently, her parents had thought it was a joke at first, and then, when they began to believe it wasn’t a curse, were considering sending her to a therapist. Out of pity, you allowed her to stop crowing. Instead, you “recruited” her to be Vienna’s assistant. She was a tall, cute, strawberry blonde, so you began including her in the occasional “fun” sessions you had with Vienna.

Jennifer had called you to show off her engagement ring, and to tell you how overjoyed her mother was at her marital plans. You went over to visit her, and had some more “fun” with her and Brian.

At school, you didn’t do too much – just tweaked a few relationships here and there. Mostly you just watched with amusement as Stacy and Rachel grew more and more attracted to one another. You weren’t the only one who noticed. You overheard one girl say, “I thought those two hated each other’s guts? The way they look at each other sometimes, you’d almost think they were in love!”

One day, there had been an assembly – virtually the entire student body, faculty and other staff were present. You had the principal call the school to order and then introduce you. Looking at everyone, you said:

“From now on, all of you will obey any commands I may give you. When you are not under my direct orders, you will behave normally. You will tell no one that you are under my control unless I tell you to. You will not interfere with me or question what I am doing at any time, unless you believe that I might be exposing myself to some danger of which I might be unaware. Vienna, come up here.”

Vienna came and stood next to you.

“Vienna is my chief acolyte. If she tells you to do something, saying ‘The Mistress wills it’, you will obey her as though the order came from me. Vienna will never issue such an order without instructions from me. Do you understand?”

“Yes, Mistress!”, they all said as one. A thrill went through you. This was what power felt like! A shame you couldn’t do this over the TV – you could take over the country just like that!

You continued: “Your first order: From now on, you will all obey all school rules, unless ordered otherwise by me. You will treat one another with respect and kindness. No more bullying by anyone! Good-natured teasing is allowed, but take care to err on the side of caution, and not go too far. Do you understand?”

“Yes, Mistress!”

You felt good about this – you were helping people with your powers!

“Good. You will not think or speak about what I have said today consciously, merely obey my orders when they are given to you.”

You turned to the principal, and said quietly, “As soon as you can, get me a list of anyone who was absent today, and when they next come in, make sure I get to see them as soon as possible.”

The principal agreed.

“Good, now carry on with the regular assembly.”

You went and sat down and the school day went on as normal. At lunchtime, the principal’s secretary brought you a list of the absentees. Over the next few days, you brought the rest of them under your control. Schooltime became funtime for you.

Finally, the big day came. You waited for Stacy and Rachel at the park, and made sure everyone else cleared the area. You watched as they confessed their love for one another, and kissed. You were touched. Free will was overrated. All that mattered was your will!

A fews days later, Stacy had called you and told you how negatively her parents had reacted when Stacy had come out to them. You had gone to meet with her parents, Willem and Greta Van Der Brugge, and had straightened them out. Then you’d had your bright idea to juggle with their relationships. You’d gone to see Rachel’s parents, Ted and Leah Anderson. They had been more accepting of their daughter’s lifestyle announcement, but you still needed to prep them for the changes you were making. Eventually, Stacy and Rachel’s relationship became public knowledge. Rachel had even persuaded Stacy to become “political”, at least on the subject of gay rights.

For the next few days, you were distracted by news from Jennifer. Her “monthly visitor” had failed to show up on time, and she’d picked up a home pregnancy test. Sure enough, she was expecting! She wanted you to know that she and Brian were moving their wedding date up, so that she wouldn’t be obviously pregnant during the ceremony. She would be inviting you, and was hoping you would come. You told her that you would be delighted to come.

A short while later, you got a call from Greta, asking you to come over. You got cabfare from your mother and went right there. It occurred to you that you ought to finagle a car of your own at some point.

Greta sat down and told you her story.

“Ever since Stacy started going out with Rachel, Willem and I have made an effort to get to know Ted and Leah Anderson, Rachel’s parents. I really hit it off with Leah. I don’t make friends easily, but I immediately felt a connection with her, and she seemed to feel the same way about me. After a while, I began to realize that I wanted to be more than friends with her. It was very strange, I’d never felt that way about a woman before. I tried to shake it off, but I couldn’t! finally, I had to tell her. Amazingly enough, she felt the same way about me! We fought it at first, but we couldn’t restrain ourselves. Pretty soon we were sleeping together. I love Willem, but with Leah I have something I never had with a man!”

She paused, smiled, and then continued.

“We had to be discreet, but it helped that Willem and Ted suddenly seemed to be busy all the time. We didn’t care, it just made it easier for us to get together. Then, last Saturday night, we had the Andersons over for dinner. Afterwards, Willem and Ted went into the TV room to watch some game or other. Leah and I went off upstairs – ostensibly to do some ‘girl talk’, but really for a ‘game’ of our own. Anyway, Leah suggested we try something new, something which we needed some whipped cream for. So, I snuck quietly down to the kitchen to get some. On my way, I heard some odd noises from the TV room. I looked in, and saw Willem and Ted playing a 'game' of their own on the couch! No-holds-barred wrestling, I guess you could call it. I backed quietly out of the room, and quickly went and got Leah. “

She smiled again.

“Gesturing for her to be quiet, I led her down to the TV room and showed her what was going on. When the boys reached what you might call a good stopping point, I cleared my throat and said:

‘So, how long has this been going on?’”

This time she laughed out loud.

“Oh, the looks on their faces were priceless! Leah and I tried to look stern, but finally we broke down laughing. We decided to play fair with them, and confessed that Leah and I had been similarly involved for a while ourselves. Willem and I invited the Andersons to spend the night, so that we could discuss it in the morning. Willem and Ted went to the guest room, and Leah and I went back up to our bedroom, although not before I got the whipped cream from the kitchen.”

“So”, you asked, “how did the conversation go the next day?”

“Well, we managed to arrange a modus vivendi of sorts. For the foreseeable future, we would maintain a public façade that nothing had changed. As far as the world at large is concerned, we’re still just two married couples who are close friends and spend a lot of time together. Privately, Leah and I and Willem and Ted would give each other the space we need to be with our lovers, discreetly, of course. No outsiders need to know. We did feel we had to tell Stacy and Rachel, though.”

“Oh? And how did they react to that?”

“Well, they were shocked, a bit. Children don’t like to think of their parents as sexual beings, you know, even though sex is where children usually come from. Rachel thinks we ought to ‘go public’, but she agreed to respect our privacy.”

“Wow, well, thanks for letting me know, Greta. Maybe sometime I can come over and watch you two go at it.” You’d found that you liked watching people have sex almost as much as you liked doing it yourself!

“Of course, dear, anytime.”

You asked her for cabfare home, but instead she insisted on having her chauffeur drive you. As you rode home, it occurred to you that while you’d been “adjusting” other people’s families, your own could use a little adjusting as well.

Who should you “adjust” first?

The next morning you went down for breakfast, Vienna trailing along behind you obediently. Your brother was lounging around at the kitchen table. You had “cured” him of treating you like a little kid, but you still felt that he took up too much space around the house. In another month, he would be graduating from college, just as you would soon be graduating from high school.

You scanned his mind. He was a smart enough guy, but he was unmotivated. He had a girlfriend, Sharon Lebowski, a cute, blonde girl, who probably could do better than him. The relationship was just sort of coasting along. You decided to stick a pin in his bottom (metaphorically) to move him along.

“Will”, you asked. “Where’s Sharon today?”

“She’s got the day off. She’s gonna be coming over around Noon.”

You reached into his mind and gave instructions. He finished his breakfast and went and got showered and dressed. You had Vienna feed you breakfast, then you went and showered and dressed yourself.

“Vienna”, you said. “Call around to the kids in our class until you find a dozen of them that are free this afternoon. Tell them to report here at 2:00 p.m., tell them ‘the Mistress wills it.’”

“Yes, Mistress”, said Vienna, who made a beeline for the phone.

You had William drive you to a jewelry store, where you helped him pick out an engagement ring – surprisingly, he knew her ring size. Apparently, Sharon had been hinting. Then you called Willem Van Der Brugge. He owned several rental properties, and you had him arrange for a nice one to be rented to your brother, one that he could move into immediately. You also had him arrange to use his connections to get William a job right after graduation.

When Sharon arrived at Noon, you had your brother propose to her, and made sure that she accepted eagerly. You instructed them to be devoted, loyal, loving spouses to one another, and to get cracking on providing your parents with grandchildren. You gave William further instructions to always work hard and well at the job that Willem arranged for him, and at any other job he had, so he’d always be a good provider. Then you had him drive you all back home and pick up your parents. You dropped off Vienna at her parents’ home – you’d promised her some time with them as a reward for being a good girl. You called Liz and told her to report to your house to fill in in Vienna’s absence. From there, you went and picked up Sharon’s parents.

After that, you drove to City Hall, where you had Will and Sharon buy a marriage license. Technically, there was a 24 hour waiting period, but you “persuaded” the clerk to waive that, and William and Sharon were soon married. Back at home, Liz was supervising the kids that Vienna had called, and they were busily packing William’s stuff up.

You all went to your brother’s new home, where Mr. V was waiting with the lease to sign. He waived the first three months’ rent as a wedding present. As a bonus, the apartment was a furnished one. You had the kids unpack your brother’s things, then sent them off to the Lebowskis’ place to pick up Sharon’s things. You sent both sets of parents out to buy a few things the newlyweds would need. By 5:00 p.m., the happy couple was all settled in. You had a big pizza party, and then left William and Sharon to get to work on producing grandchildren.
